author: ZorbaTHut
body:
[The Motte has moved offsite](https://www.themotte.org/). Join us in our new home! All future Culture War threads, and other content, will be posted there.

If you'd like to talk about this, please use [the Meta thread](https://www.reddit.com/r/TheMotte/comments/x5t3jh/meta_the_motte_is_dead_long_live_the_motte/).

Hope to see you soon.
